h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: You'll need to cross a thin wooden beam next, and to make matters worse, a Yaksha Archer will be posted at the far end to harass you. Resist the urge to perform a mobile Staff Spin, as walking while spinning seems to automatically make you lurch to the side, and you'll plummet to your death.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
You'll need to cross a thin wooden beam next, and to make matters worse, a Yaksha Archer will be posted at the far end to harass you. Resist the urge to perform a mobile Staff Spin, as walking while spinning seems to automatically make you lurch to the side, and you'll plummet to your death.
